title: If you are in the Reconnect Screen and you hit "view club profile" you can't reconnect w/out relog
body: title. It's impossible to go back to the reconnect screen without relogging. Not a too pressing matter I just noticed it.

replies.body: Well huh....that's weird for sure. Not sure why that's messing up the reconnecting process, but make sure you report that bug through the client bug report in the bottom right or post it here in [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) as well!

Oh no it doesn't keep you from reconnecting. Sorry I didn't clarify this.

I meant you literally can't return to the home screen from the view profile page so you can hit the reconnect button in the first place.
Oh snap that's even more awkward for sure. That probably shouldn't happen, and if it does again, try to grab some sort of video to send over with a bug report!
